text: When I was a kid, I was

really interested in everything
related to technology, IT, and computers.

When I saw systems
that can recognize the difference

between cats and dogs for instance,
I was thinking,

“Oh wow, how does
the machine can know the difference here?”
I realized that the AI is the future,

so I wanted to be specialized in the AI
and the ML.

And I said that the only way to do
that is by taking a master course,
so that's why I moved to the UK.
I was doing my master degree

in artificial intelligence
at City, University of London where

I learned the theory and application
part of the AI.

I was working as a team member at the Pizza
Hut branch in London.
I was working 12 hours a day sometimes.
Then I had the chance to register in the AWS Academy course.
I did that and then it opened
a lot of doors for me.

By taking that course,
I had the chance to do

a lot of interviews with lot of companies,
and one of them was Firemind.

And here I am now,
a Data Scientist at Firemind.

The AWS Academy was the starting point for
my cloud journey, because after the course,

I did my AWS Cloud Practitioner Exam. So far
I have four certifications

and I have the experience
and then I have the confidence of using
AWS services.

Sometimes I imagine myself
not taking that course.

I would be still searching
for a job. By taking that course

and then getting an offer from
Firemind, I think that changed my life.
